column5: I fish LOW 7-8 weeks a year and I leave my boat at the Resort that I stay....I am looking for boat storage for my 18' Ranger just over the border....Who has some space....garage....pole building for rent Thanks

[font color=green size=3][b]Have you considered putting a carport up? Every little town here in Iowa seems to have a carport on display. They are steel tube frames with steel roofing running length wise of the carport. I've been looking at a 18' wide by 21' long by 5' wall hieght for $795, from a company out of Illinois. A freind put one up south of Perrault Falls last summer, it will hold two boats nicely. All you would need to do then is find a place to set it up.
We store about 35 boats at Buena Vista in Morson and sometimes have open spaces. buenavistaresort.com
